channel.title: Need help creating a .JAR for my server!
channel.description:
Hello, i need someone to help me create a .jar so i can have players on my server. Please add me on skype so we can talk! skype: iserverhoster
Thanks a million,
Chris

item.title: Need help creating a .JAR for my server!
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

The real problem is a lack of proper documentation for educating those who want to learn. Stumbling in the dark often results in a learning curve too steep to securely and safely run something for entrusting player credentials with.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help creating a .JAR for my server!

item.title: Need help creating a .JAR for my server!
item.dc:creator: @tigerclan tigerclan
item.description:
@tigerclan wrote:

I’m not saying he doesnt need to learn how or that he shouldnt. I’m just saying he shouldnt host a server for people to play on for some time

Read full topic
item.source: Need help creating a .JAR for my server!

item.title: Need help creating a .JAR for my server!
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

tigerclan:

If you can’t make a jar file then please do us all a favor and don’t host a server

He needs to learn how to , nobody is born with knowledge you derp.

OT: You can find many tutorials on how to jar a client either here or on another website , or just simply google it

Read full topic
